esema 1356 saha 1360di wishala rathu jatakaruwnage aakramana dwithwayak mandalana ladi. 1364di, cho yon senpathiya wisin aakramanika mongoliyanu tumenaya paradawa goryowa palanayata mongoliyanuwan daru awasana uthsahaya da wyartha karana ladi. 1380 dashakaye goryowa siya awadhanaya wokowu tharjanaya wetha yomu kala athara cho muson wisin muhudu kollakara naw siyagananak winasha kirima sandaha nawika kalathuwakku hamudawa nirmanaya karana ladi. 1392 wana thek goryo rajawanshaya pawathini. 1388di kumanthranayak magin joson rajawanshaye aarambhakaya wu josonhi thejo balaya siyathata gath athara, rajawarun dedenaku pasupasa hinda rajyaya meheyawimen pasu ohu wisin 1392di joson rajawanshaya pihituwana ladi.[138]
